abstract: Stocks remain largely flat after day of mixed pre-Thanksgiving trading.
lead_paragraph: HP shares were sinking after the company reported weak PC, printer and software sales, but shares of its HP Enterprise unit rose as sales improved.

headline.print_headline: Shares End Day Before Holiday Little Changed

snippet: HP shares were sinking after the company reported weak PC, printer and software sales, but shares of its HP Enterprise unit rose as sales improved.
